short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A bookmarker extension that help you clear up your favorites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You may want more features beyond chrome default book marker. "Just Marker" gives you ability to control your favorites more, like classifying groups, drag and drop urls, changing marker themes... 

Of course Just Marker has more space for further improvement because it is made in the first version. You are welcome to join the development if you have ideas. If you have interest, please send me emails.
